Note: In the given paragraph, "chain Article length - dependent" and "spin-coating temperature independent" are the properties or factors that are being described. Therefore, "chain Article length" and "spin-coating temperature" are the property values.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value          |
|-----------------------|

Note: In the given paragraph, "chain Article length - dependent" can be broken down to "chain Article length" which refers to a material property. "device performance trend" can also be considered a material property as it is related to the performance of the device. Therefore, "chain Article length" and "device performance" are the valid property values. "spin-coating temperature independent" describes the relationship between the property and a process parameter, but it does not directly refer to a material property value.
